title.rendered: Clutch Names A&A Associate Among the UAE’ Top Business Set-up, Auditing and Accounting Firms for 2021

content.rendered:
At A&A Associate, we are a UAE-based management consulting firm that focuses on producing cost-effective value-added services to meet all your business requirements. We emphasize on satisfying the highest standards of quality possible while at the same time paying attention to professional ethics.

We combine the emerging technologies and ensure a one-stop solution for all your business needs starting from licensing till liquidation. Let your business grow with our team of qualified advisors and their dedicated services!

With that said, we are honored to announce that Clutch’s research showcases A&A Associate as one of the United Arab Emirates’ top business set-up, auditing and accounting firms for 2021. For additional context, Clutch is the leading ratings and reviews platform for IT, marketing, and business service providers. Each month, over half a million buyers and sellers of services use the Clutch platform, and the user base is growing over 50% a year.

Each year, Clutch highlights the top B2B companies across different industries. The top business service providers deliver high-quality customer service and have accumulated deep knowledge in their fields of expertise. To be eligible for a Clutch Leader Award, companies must exhibit an unusually high ability to deliver top-tier work to their clients. Receiving this award is no small feat, and we’re extremely appreciative of this recognition.

“This means a lot. Clutch has an extensive methodology for selecting companies for awards. This award will surely help retain the image of our company in the market.” – Rajaram Durairaj, Managing Director, A&A Associate

We are extremely grateful to our clients for the continued trust and confidence they’ve accorded to us. Their reviews on our Clutch profile prove that we have what it takes to deliver top-tier accounting services. Below is a quote from one of the reviews we received.

“They have a very good management team. The way they organize everything and work with clients is amazing. They always keep their word and complete their work within the scheduled timeframe.” – Audit Associate, SNR Auditing

Are you in need of reliable and accurate business setup, auditing and accounting services? Please don’t hesitate to message us

Also Read

The Expo 2020 Guide: What You Need To Know
